items.description: Led an internal pentesting teamsecuring global infrastructure. Developed automated tools in Python and Bash, responded to CVEs and zero-day threats, and coordinated rapid incident handling. Ensured security readiness while mentoring junior pentesters across international projects.

Performed full-scope pentests: web apps (XSS, auth bypass), APIs, mobile, Wi-Fi, and network infrastructure (internal/external). Delivered strategic findings to international clients (USA & LATAM). Adept in Burp Suite, Nmap, Kali, and Python-based tooling.

Designed and tested secure networks (segmentation, CCTV, visibility). Achieved CCNA. Participated in a national CTF competition, winning 2nd place with a 750â‚¬ prize. Contributed to factory test validations (FAT) for critical infrastructure.

Assisted with infrastructure audits (RGPD, red team focus). Set up environments using Docker, managed Active Directory, and contributed to technical security operations. Hands-on with digital forensics and system hardening.
Collaborated on a cybersecurity research project focused on malicious traffic detection using machine learning and anomaly-based models.
